name: Large Hydro Slime
desc:
A monster created by the sedimentation of Hydro dispersed throughout nature.
A larger and more powerful Hydro Slime that can create bubbles to entrap its enemies. It is said that they can grow to truly staggering sizes if given an energy-rich environment. Eyewitnesses have supposedly seen Hydro Slimes as large as a small mound in Wolvendom.

dropMaterial.name: Mora
dropMaterial.desc: Common currency. The one language everybody speaks.

dropMaterial.name: Slime Condensate
dropMaterial.desc: A thick coating found on slimes. Most commonly seen material in elemental workshops.

dropMaterial.name: Slime Secretions
dropMaterial.desc: Mildly purified slime secretions. Harmful to the skin. Please avoid direct exposure.

dropMaterial.name: Slime Concentrate
dropMaterial.desc: Concentrated slime essence. When left alone, it will begin to move on its own.
